text:
FULL CODE
   CC:  cholangitis, pancreatitis, respiratory failure, HOTN
   83 yo M, Russian speaking only and deaf, presented to [**Hospital1 19**] ED with
   sharp RUQ pain, worsening over 2d.  In ED was tachy to 115, EKG with
   nonspecific changes, increased AST/ALT, lipase 2650, CT abd/pelvis
   revealed CBD stone and pancreatic head inflammation.  Admitted to Fin
   MICU for ERCP.  Intubated for procedure, two stones retrieved, one in
   common hepatic duct and one in ampulla; sphincterotomy performed.
   Hypotensive post induction and neo started (1mg/kg/min) in GI suite.
   PMH:  HTN, DM II, Congenital Deafness (Russian sign), CAD (fixed apical
   myocardial defect with EF 40% [**5-/2121**]), Osteoarthritis, Bifasicular
   block, L subclavian steal syndrome
   Pt extubated at beginning of shift, minimal secretions.  Has been on 2L
   NC overnight, LSCTA b/l and satting 96%.
   Myocardial infarction, acute (AMI, STEMI, NSTEMI)
   Assessment:
   Pt in SR, HR initially in high 80
s,  PVC
s frequently observed, no
   runs V-tach, denies CP.  Increasing tachycardia overnoc, now w/ HR back
   to 115.  T-max=100.1, endorses abd pain, BP
s WNL
   Action:
   NS bolus 500cc x2, 250cc x1, am labs sent, repeat EKG
   Response:
   Boluses well tolerated and slightly improved u/o but not HR.  Narcotic
   administered for pain with moderate effect on pt comfort but also no
   effect on HR.  EKG confirms sinus tach w/o additional changes.  Hct
   =39, down from 42.  Troponin =1.00, up from .89
   Plan:
   Continue to monitor HR/BP, pain control, monitor fever curve
   Pancreatitis, acute
   Assessment:
   Lipase 2650. Pt with abdominal pain.  Belly became increasingly
   distended and firm overnight.  +BS in all four quadrants, + flatus
   Action:
   IV vancomycin and zosyn as ordered, IVF boluses x3, IVF running at
   150cc/hr, KUB, am labs sent, pain control
   Response:
   Lipase down to 1702.  WBC climbed to 24.3.  KUB pending.  Morphine 1mg
   IV x2, 2mg IV x2 with pt now getting some relief and resting.  ABX well
   tol
   Plan:
   Zosyn only due this am.  Continue IVF at 150cc/hr for liter #2, f/u on
   KUB, monitor bowel sounds, tenderness.  Morphine 2-3mg IV prn pain
   Son, [**Name (NI) 5449**] telephoned for update overnight.
